title: New Apartment AVAILABLE NOW!!!
posting_body: The beautiful Vinewood Apartments are located on a leafy block within Southwest Detroit.
The building is one block from the lively Vernor Corridor ~ where you'll find grocery stores, bars, restaurants, shops, and more.
It's also a quick drive / bus ride / bike ride to the Michigan Central Station, Corktown, and Downtown Detroit.
All studio and 1-bedroom units have been completely renovated and are now available starting at 795.00!
Each unit features brand new kitchens and baths, heating & air conditioning, cabinets, appliances, windows, tile work, fixtures, and laminate flooring.
Heat,water and trash are included in the rent, and a full-service laundry room is also on site.
We are a pet friendly community!
Call today to schedule a tour!
